event.title: FSFE Potteries local group celebrates the "I Love Free Software" Day in Potteries, England

body.p: We celebrate the "I Love Free Software" day together. Come and join us!

ul.li: ğŸ“ The KPA Clubhouse, 97 Horwood Road, Keele University, Keele, Staffordshire, ST5 5DY, United Kingdom

ğŸ›ˆ It's on the Keele University campus just off the M6 in Staffordshire, just west of Stoke-on-Trent. The building is shown on the Keele campus map as building number 9.
